text: Gingerich is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Edward Gingerich (1966–2011), Amish man convicted of manslaughter * Mose Gingerich (born 1979), Amish-born documentary-maker * Owen Gingerich (born 1930), American astronomer * Philip D. Gingerich (born 1946), American paleontologist ==See also== * 2658 Gingerich, main-belt asteroid * Gingrich, surname * Giegerich, surname
title: Gingerich
